title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

title: Logan
description: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an aging Wolverine takes care of an ailing Professor X.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa returns home to Wakanda to take his rightful place as king but faces a powerful enemy.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing paths with five counterparts.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble once more to undo Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Joker
description: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of an iconic villain.

title: Tenet
description: A secret agent embarks on a dangerous, time-bending mission to prevent World War III.

title: Dune
description: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset.

title: The Batman
description: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind cryptic clues.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
description: A woman discovers she can traverse parallel universes and must stop a powerful threat.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After 30 years, Maverick is still pushing the limits as a top naval aviator.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully and Ney'tiri have formed a family but must leave their home and explore Pandora.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
description: John Wick takes on the High Table while facing his toughest opponents yet.

title: Oppenheimer
description: A biopic about the physicist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the Manhattan Project.

title: The Killer
description: An assassin battles his employers and himself in an international chase.

title: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen to exact revenge against those who destroyed his family.

title: Deadpool 3
description: Deadpool and Wolverine team up in the Marvel Cinematic Universe for a chaotic adventure.
